roleset.name: unknowledgeable due to inexperience

example.name: both args
example.text: He is naive to the world of love, and completely overdramatisizes the matter, acting like he will never love again.

example.name: concatenation of arg1
example.text: He is naive to think that because he trusts himself we should.
example.arg: to think that because he trusts himself we should.

roleset.note: NAIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5 (from naive.01-j)
